text: Sar is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Abdoulaye Sar *Edwin van der Sar (born 1970), Dutch association football goalkeeper *Franco Sar (1933–2018), Italian Olympic decathlete *Maya Sar (born 1981), Bosnian singer-songwriter *Nikhilananda Sar (born 1936), Indian politician * Pol Pot (1925–1998, born Saloth Sar), Cambodian dictator * SARA SALAMAT (born 1997) Pakistan's bureaucrat
title: Sar (surname)
